text: 7.22 Ais 35.5-6, 61.1, Mat 11.4-5, Luk 4.18 Jisas anɨgɨl, bɨ omɨŋal anɨb ak kɨlop agak, Ñɨli bɨ omɨŋal adɨkɨd amɨl Jon nop agɨnɨmil, Chɨl amɨl nopul, bɨ anɨb ak binɨb wɨdɨn koy gup okok gek wɨdɨn yɨbɨl lup agɨnɨmil agak. Binɨb tɨmud sawl lup okok gek takaw nepal agɨnɨmil agak. Binɨb tob tɨmel gup okok gek kanɨb aj tep gɨpal agɨnɨmil agak. Binɨb soy ladek lup okok gek mɨlep gup agɨnɨmil agak. Binɨb kubal okok gek tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨpal agɨnɨmil agak. Binɨb yɨmgeptek okok abe God takaw teplep ak agek nepal agɨnɨmil agak.
